accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The Account Id that owns the storefront. Required for security validation.

storefrontId.title: Storefront Id
storefrontId.description: The Storefront__c record Id whose hours should be updated.

dayOfWeek.title: Day of Week
dayOfWeek.description: The day to update (e.g., Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday).

openingTime.title: Opening Time
openingTime.description: Opening time in HH:MM format (24-hour), e.g., 09:00.

closingTime.title: Closing Time
closingTime.description: Closing time in HH:MM format (24-hour), e.g., 21:00.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Optional notes for this day (e.g., Closed for lunch 2-3pm).
